text.div:
COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Renal Failure

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    104931000119100 Chronic kidney disease due to hypertension (disorder)
    111411000119103 End stage renal disease due to hypertension (disorder)
    117681000119102 Chronic kidney disease stage 1 due to hypertension (disorder)
    120261000119101 Benign hypertensive heart disease and chronic renal disease stage 5 (disorder)
